Chassis.comment: Is currently used for information data but holds in original tree the PedalPosition. Will be considered using this branch for acceleration when its clear how the subsystem operates.
Chassis.description: All data concerning steering, suspension, wheels, and brakes.

VIN.description: 17-character Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) as defined by ISO 3779.

CurrentGear.description: The current gear. -1 = Reverse, 0 = Neutral, 1 = Forward.

Transmission.description: Transmission-specific data, stopping at the drive shafts.

PowerTrain.description: Powertrain data for battery management, etc.

EnginePower.description: Percentual power of the engine. <0 = Engine works against its current speed, 0 = Neutral state of the engine, >0 = Engine runs with a percentage of its power.

Gear.description: The current gear. -1 = Reverse, 0 = Neutral, 1 = Forward.

HeartBeat.description: Keep-alive signal so that the vehicle knows that there is still a connection.

SteeringAngle.description: Represents the current input angle of the steering system, typically corresponds to angle applied by driver on the steering-wheel. Positive for angle in counterclockwise direction (based on ISO8855).
